--- title: Data utils keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Utility functions to manipulate data" ---

np_to_tensor[source]

np_to_tensor(x, tensor_type)

Convert a numpy ndarray into a tensor. If tensor_type is 'image', put channel first.

show_img[source]

show_img(x, ax=None, figsize=(3, 3), title=None, hide_axis=True, cmap='viridis', alpha=None, **kwargs)

Convienience function for plotting images

load_batches[source]

load_batches(folder, bs=16, device='cpu')

Generator function that loads images from folder in batches of size bs on device.
